name: Program Design
description: Transforming large programs require relationships with and deep understanding of the different stakeholders, systems, and problems sets. I embed myself in the teams, work on their problems with them, learn and deliver.

name: Interactive Experiences
description: Something about the beauty and challenges of designing immersive interactive experiences. And the breadth of my experience.

name: Complex Systems
description: Breaking down and visualizing complex systems to make them understandable and manageable.

name: Health IT
description: Developing healthcare technology solutions that improve patient outcomes and provider efficiency.

name: AI in Health
description: Leveraging artificial intelligence to enhance healthcare delivery and decision-making processes.
